data.name: Jelle's Marble League
data.detailed_description:
The ultimate YouTube distraction comes to life in this realistic and engaging simulation of Jelle's Marble League.



Play in 16 Track and Field style events as any one of the 30 real world teams or any one of your own custom made teams.



Classic Quick Play mode to dip in and out of any unlocked event, use gold, silver and bronze marbles from event wins to unlock more events.

Quick Play Arcade mode, take part in interactive custom made events, collect talismen, stars and other collectibles to level up. Can you find all of Roldo's entourage?

Seasons Mode simulates a full season of events where winning medals and points takes you up the league as you try to become season champions.

Multiplayer lets you play your friends as well as anyone online worldwide.

Team and marble editor to build truly unique custom teams.

A growing Stats page tracks your progress.

data.short_description: The ultimate YouTube distraction comes to life in this realistic, engaging simulation of Jelle's Marble League. Play in 16 Track and Field style events as one of 30 real world teams or build your own custom teams. Online multiplayer pits you against the world's finest marble-ists.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10+ 64bit
  • Processor: i5 Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10+ 64bit
  • Processor: i5 Quad Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDEA 1070 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OSX 10.13+ 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated Graphics Card
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OSX 10.13+ 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Quad Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated Graphics Card
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
